name: 李奎皓
objective: This course gives learners the functional language they need for real-life, hands-on tasks in the technical, industrial, and scientific sectors, helping the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on reading and writings. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings. Creative Thinking skills – including analysis, evaluation, synthesis, reflection, inference, and problem-solving – are fully integrated into every section, to help learners develop communicative skills.
